selection_reasoning: The top three successful trials represent three distinct and effective strategies: penalty-based optimization, two-stage refinement, and global basin-hopping. I will carry these forward to refine their implementations and combine their strengths in the next generation.

trial_selections.reasoning: Highest score (2.6307). The penalty-to-hard-constraint approach is very effective for finding dense packings.
Solid performance (2.6177). The two-stage approach (equal then variable) is a reliable strategy.
Good score (2.6140). Basin-hopping is a powerful global optimizer that can be further tuned.
